plot: Ekema's hard and uncompromising attitude towards his heavily pregnant wife, Joffi, is quickly revised when he gets to spend an entire day 'in her shoes'.
title: Beleh
plot_es: Ekema's hard and uncompromising attitude towards his heavily pregnant wife, Joffi, is quickly revised when he gets to spend an entire day 'in her shoes'.
plot_en: Ekema's hard and uncompromising attitude towards his heavily pregnant wife, Joffi, is quickly revised when he gets to spend an entire day 'in her shoes'.
